programme.desc: A woman discovers a chest of gold only to discover that the treasure belongs to an evil leprechaun.

programme.title: Shottas
programme.desc: Two men from Jamaica begin a ruthless climb to the top of a criminal enterprise in Miami.

programme.title: Hotel Artemis
programme.desc: Jodie Foster stars as the Nurse, running a secret emergency room for criminals in riot-torn, near-future LA.

programme.title: Thick as Thieves
programme.desc: A thief (Alec Baldwin) is set up by an ambitious gangster, sparking a deadly game of cat and mouse.

programme.desc: A campus culture war at a predominantly white school comes to a head after an offensive Halloween party.
